thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com | 288 2
thread.title: Randy R
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Randy R

author: Randy R
title: Randy R
text:
I've ordered with Banggood *many* times now, and have always gotten what I ordered and it arrived as quick as one might expect from China to the US. The products have always been as-described (mostly electronics and rc drone parts and tools) and of good quality for my needs.
Only once (out of maybe 10 orders now) did an order arrive with an incorrect item. And I was a little concerned because a $35 item had arrived when I had ordered a $200+ item!! Yikes!
BUT, they quickly corrected the issue, sent a new original item as a replacement, and even let me keep the incorrect item, which was something I could use anyway. It only took a few email exchanges and a few days, due to the time differences between China and US. I thought the service was quite good.
I would recommend them highly, and have always had good experiences.
